add_comment_to_conversation.description: Add an internal comment/note to a conversation in Respond.io.

props.name: text
props.description: The internal comment to add (max 1000 characters). You can mention users with {{@user.ID}} format where ID is the user ID.

add_tag_to_contact.description: Add one or multiple tags to a contact in Respond.io.

props.name: tags
props.description: Tags to add to the contact (minimum 1, maximum 10 tags).

props.name: tag
props.description: Name of the tag to add.

assign_or_unassign_conversation.description: Assign or unassign a conversation to/from a team member in Respond.io.

create_contact.description: Create a new contact record in Respond.io.

props.name: identifier
props.description: Must be a unique identifier for the new contact. Use format: `email:user@example.com` or `phone:+60123456789`.

props.name: email
props.description: The email address of the contact.

props.name: phone
props.description: The phone number of the contact (in E.164 format).

props.name: language
props.description: Language code (e.g., "en", "es") following ISO 639-1.

props.name: profilePic
props.description: A direct URL to the contact's profile picture.

props.name: countryCode
props.description: Country code (e.g., "US", "MY") following ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

props.name: customFields
props.description: Add custom fields for the contact.

props.name: name
props.description: Name of the custom field (e.g., "Company Website", "Department").

props.name: value
props.description:
Value of the custom field. Format based on field type:
- Text: "string" (use quotation marks)
- Number: 123 (without quotation marks)
- Email: "user@domain.com"
- URL: "https://example.com"
- Date: "yyyy-mm-dd"
- Time: "HH:MM" (24H format)
- Checkbox: "true" or "false"

create_or_update_contact.description: Create a new contact or update an existing one by email, phone, or ID.

props.name: identifier
props.description: Identifier for the contact. Use format: `id:123`, `email:user@example.com`, or `phone:+60123456789`. If contact exists, it will be updated; if not, a new one will be created.

props.name: email
props.description: The email address of the contact.

props.name: phone
props.description: The phone number of the contact (in E.164 format).

props.name: language
props.description: Language code (e.g., "en", "es") following ISO 639-1.

props.name: profilePic
props.description: A direct URL to the contact's profile picture.

props.name: countryCode
props.description: Country code (e.g., "US", "MY") following ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

props.name: customFields
props.description: Add custom fields for the contact.

props.name: name
props.description: Name of the custom field (e.g., "Company Website", "Department").

props.name: value
props.description:
Value of the custom field. Format based on field type:
- Text: "string" (use quotation marks)
- Number: 123 (without quotation marks)
- Email: "user@domain.com"
- URL: "https://example.com"
- Date: "yyyy-mm-dd"
- Time: "HH:MM" (24H format)
- Checkbox: "true" or "false"

delete_contact.description: Permanently delete a contact from Respond.io.

find_contact.description: Search for contacts by name, email, or phone number in Respond.io.

props.name: search
props.description: The value to search for (e.g., email address, phone number, or name).

props.name: timezone
props.description: Timezone for the search (e.g., "Asia/Kuala_Lumpur"). Optional.

props.name: limit
props.description: Number of contacts to return (1-99). Default is 10.

props.name: cursorId
props.description: Contact ID to start from for pagination. Optional.

open_conversation.description: Mark a conversation as open in Respond.io.

contact_tag_updated.description: Triggers when a tag is added or removed from a contact in Respond.io.

contact_updated.description: Triggers when an existing contact is updated in Respond.io.

conversation_closed.description: Triggers when a conversation is closed.

conversation_opened.description: Triggers when a new conversation is opened.

new_contact.description: Triggers when a new contact is created in Respond.io.

new_incoming_message.description: Triggers when a new message is received from a contact.

new_outgoing_message.description: Triggers when a message is sent from Respond.io.
